mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, category, color, size, price, description) VALUES (#{productName}, #{category}, #{color}, #{size}, #{price}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, category = #{category}, color = #{color}, size = #{size}, price = #{price}, description = #{description} WHERE product_no = #{productNo}
